description: Source code for a custom web component 'todo-item' implementing a to-do list item with editing, toggling, and removal functionalities.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: Custom HTML element class representing a to-do list item with editing, toggling, and removal capabilities.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the DOM elements based on the current attribute values.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for the to-do item.

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing and blurs the input.

methods.name: toggleItem
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of the to-do item and dispatches an event.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes the to-do item and dispatches a removal event.

methods.name: updateItem
methods.description: Handles updating the item's title or removing it if the title is empty.

methods.name: addListeners
methods.description: Adds event listeners to DOM elements.

methods.name: removeListeners
methods.description: Removes event listeners from DOM elements.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles attribute changes and updates the component accordingly.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Initializes the component when added to the DOM.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Cleans up event listeners when removed from the DOM.
